EXPIRED_TIME_OTP_TEXT: This code will expire in {time} minutes. If you did not request this code, please ignore this email.
VERIFY_ACCOUNT_TEXT_1: You're receiving this email because you requested a One-Time Password (OTP) code to verify your account.
INSTRUCTIONS_TEXT_ENTER_OTP_VERIFY_ACCOU: Enter the OTP code above to verify your account.
INSTRUCTIONS_TEXT_ENTER_OTP_RESET_PASSWO: Enter the OTP code above to reset your password.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_TEXT_1: You're receiving this email because you requested to reset your password. If you did not make this request, please ignore this email.
